pullrequest.title: added the two functions needed for gazebow to behave like gzweb for the metter of the models and materials

content.raw:
This line is very similar to line 152, that is used in line 160. The main difference is that line 156 allows you to pass in a path, but in the case of this line (142), the path is gotten from `GetModelPaths`. 

What would happen if you tried to set the variable  `process.env.GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH = "the/new/path" ` before calling GetMaterials?
content.html:
This line is very similar to line 152, that is used in line 160. The main difference is that line 156 allows you to pass in a path, but in the case of this line (142), the path is gotten from GetModelPaths.

What would happen if you tried to set the variable process.env.GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH = "the/new/path" before calling GetMaterials?
